title: please explain the button R riot...
body: so everytime and i mean EVERYTIME i get that perfect moment with kennen where i only need to press R and zhonyas to penta then nothing works and i mean NOTHING. only my R dont work and i die. it happens EVERYTIME. and i just have to say its really annoying how you say its my keyboard and never admit that you proabably are spectating my games and making me unable to ult because im too good for normals and low elo in ranked. stop it riot

replies.body: this is exactly what i mean. my keyboard is perfectly fine since it works when no one is near but as soon as i get the perfect moment to ult then it dont work. thats riot who is trolling me not my keyboard
